title: PGIMER Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Senior Resident Posts
description: Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research (PGIMER) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MD/ MS, DNB can grab this chance and apply for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025 . Here we included the age limit, selection process, salarystructure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the walk-in at the address ...
